original_text: People who do not know God strongly want to have sex in a wrong way. They cannot control themselves. You must not be like those people.
korean_text: 하나님을 모르는 이방인과 같이 색욕을 따르지 말고

sentences.original_text: People who do not know God
strongly want to have sex in a wrong way
sentences.korean_translation: 그릇된 방법으로 성관계를 갖기를 강하게 원합니다

sentences.original_text: You must not be like those people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그런 사람들과 같아서는 안 됩니다
